name: Elvira II: The Jaws of Cerberus (1990)
name_original: Elvira II: The Jaws of Cerberus (1990)
description:
An evil force has penetrated our universe, possessing Black Widow Productions in Hollywood. The studio owner, Elvira herself, has vanished. And now three cavernous movie sets - a graveyard, haunted house, and catacombs - are erupting with the most hideous monsters of gothic horror. 

Your quest? Find and rescue Elvira from these three craven worlds then fight a final cataclysmic battle with a nether-world entity of awesome dimension and fury.

Features:
  • Nearly 4000 locations - five times larger than Elvira I!
  • Three huge & horrifying worlds to explore
  • Over 120 hours of suspense - intense gameplay
  • More than 700 deadly weapons, scrolls & other tools of the trade
  • Fully animated encounters with hundreds of formidable new opponents
  • New on-screen spell book generator
  • New 360-degree, on-screen enemy detector & tracker
  • New on-screen hit-point allocation system
  • Haunting soundtrack
